name: 10.5281/zenodo.10782701
title: Wastewater Surveillance AMELAG
description: This file gives an overview of the data provided in the dataset in Data Package Standard format (https://datapackage.org). The documented data set is available on Zenodo (https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10782701) and Github (https://github.com/robert-koch-institut/Abwassersurveillance_AMELAG).
